Most Illustrious Sir

In the capacity of Colonel Chief of the Legion of National Guards of this District and competently authorized by the Most Excellent Sir Your Lordship Captain Francisco Xavier, commander of the forces besieging the town of São José do Norte, so that not only the enemies are prevented from taking possession of them, but also to supply our divisions with such articles, should they become necessary. 2nd — To all persons who take said ponchos Your Lordship Your Lordship Your Lordship Manuel Rodrigues Cordeiro to forward them to the Most Excellent Sir Bento Gonçalves da Silva. From now on Your Lordship remain

God keep Your Lordship Pantano Grande Estate, August 9, 1836. Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim José de Freitas Justice of the Peace of the Parish of Mostardas. Domingos José de Almeida Colonel Chief of the Legion of the District of Rio Grande.
